title: Side Hustle Growth - Multiple Income Sources
prompt: My main job pays $3200 monthly, but I also have this side business that's been bringing in an extra $800 per month. Monthly expenses are around $3400 total. I want to invest $2500 in June to expand the side business - new equipment and marketing stuff. The investment should pay off by August when I expect the side income to jump to $1200 monthly instead. Oh, I've got $1800 saved up right now. Timeline: May 2024 through December.
